import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{io}from"socket.io-client";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const socket=io("https://blackjack-api-l0ne.onrender.com");// Ändra om du byter backend-URL
export default function App(){const[gameId,setGameId]=useState(null);const[gameState,setGameState]=useState(null);const[playerName,setPlayerName]=useState("");const[joined,setJoined]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{socket.on("update",data=>{setGameState(data);});},[]);const createGame=()=>{socket.emit("create_game",{playerName},_ref=>{let{gameId,gameState}=_ref;setGameId(gameId);setGameState(gameState);setJoined(true);});};const joinGame=()=>{socket.emit("join_game",{gameId,playerName},_ref2=>{let{gameState}=_ref2;setGameState(gameState);setJoined(true);});};const sendMove=move=>{socket.emit("move",{gameId,move},_ref3=>{let{gameState}=_ref3;setGameState(gameState);});};if(!joined){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:20},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Blackjack"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Ditt namn",value:playerName,onChange:e=>setPlayerName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:createGame,children:"Skapa spel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Spel-ID",value:gameId||"",onChange:e=>setGameId(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:joinGame,children:"G\xE5 med i spel"})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:20},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["V\xE4lkommen, ",playerName,"!"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{children:JSON.stringify(gameState,null,2)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>sendMove("hit"),children:"Hit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>sendMove("stand"),children:"Stand"})]});}
